title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - August 16, 2019
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - August 16, 2019
description:
Hosted by Jason Kelly

Featuring highlights from the latest issue of Bloomberg Businessweek.

-Dan Ten Kate talks about the next steps in the ongoing protests in Hong Kong

-Dimitra Kessenides describes how Illinois is taking on hackers

-Sarah Frier discusses Facebook keeping its data private

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
